speaker: janitor
dialog: Another day at work I guess....

speaker: janitor
dialog: At least it's beautiful among the stars. The view looking down on Earth is breathtaking.

speaker: janitor
dialog: This is JANITOR 5 - 0 with Earth's SKY NET. I copy!

speaker: boss
dialog: You have multiple bogeys inbound with a collision course set for Los Angeles. Start up your engines!

speaker: janitor
dialog: Tell me something I don't know. JANITOR 5 - 0 on course to intercept, over.
